languages.text: "Я слышала шепот Неумирающего. Он ждет тебя. Он зовет тебя. Быть может, просто время твое еще не пришло".
"I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."
languages.original_text: "Я слышала шепот Неумирающего. Он ждет тебя. Он зовет тебя. Быть может, просто время твое еще не пришло".

traits.locale_text: "I have heard the Undying One's whisper. He is awaiting you. He is calling to you. It might be that your time is yet to come."
"I have heard the Undying One's whisper. He is awaiting you. He is calling to you. It might be that your time is yet to come."
"I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."
"I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."
"I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."
"I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."

languages.text: « J'ai entendu les murmures de l'Immortel. Il vous attend. Il vous appelle. Votre heure viendra. »
languages.original_text: "I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu les murmures de l'Immortel. Il vous attend. Il vous appelle. Votre heure viendra. »

languages.text: «He oído el susurro del Inmortal. L{mf|e|a} espera. L{mf|e|a} llama. Su momento llegará».
languages.original_text: "I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."

traits.locale_text: «He oído el susurro del Inmortal. L{mf|e|a} espera. L{mf|e|a} llama. Su momento llegará».

languages.text: “我听到了不死之神的低语。祂在等你，在呼唤你。属于你的时代必将到来。”
languages.original_text: "I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."

traits.locale_text: “我听到了不死之神的低语。祂在等你，在呼唤你。属于你的时代必将到来。”

languages.text: 「不死の者のささやきを聞きました。彼はあなたを待っています。彼はあなたを呼んでいるんです。あなたの時は、すぐ来ます」
languages.original_text: "I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者のささやきを聞きました。彼はあなたを待っています。彼はあなたを呼んでいるんです。あなたの時は、すぐ来ます」

languages.text: "Ich habe das Flüstern des Todlosen gehört. Er erwartet Euch. Er ruft Euch. Eure Zeit wird kommen."
languages.original_text: "I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe das Flüstern des Todlosen gehört. Er erwartet Euch. Er ruft Euch. Eure Zeit wird kommen."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in fısıltılarını işittim. Seni bekliyor. Sana sesleniyor. Vaktin gelecek."
languages.original_text: "I have heard the whisper of the Undying One. He awaits you. He calls to you. Your time will come."
